    Note, I use Remarkbox for comments to prevent Disqus from showing adds or other methods requiring a GitHub login for participation in any discussions. Although you are asked for you email, there is no need to verify it through remarkbox in order to leave a comment. Verification is just so you can track discussions, etc. without the system treating you as a new person every time.
